body: Please queen bee, don't touch this masterpiece with your horrible animation
Queen bee is gonna defile this
@Reaper's Sorrow are you seriously this much of a dumb cunt? There's plenty of doujinshi already like that.

@XanderRaidon so let me get this straight , you want realistic situations? from a doujinshi/eromanga?.....are you okey bro? I think you've come to the wrong place ......the sole reason I read d/e-m is because it's NOT realistic.....if it were by now probably i'd be depressed .....
@Ravenleaf “sole male” means there’s only one male getting laid, same goes for female. “FFM” means 2 female (FF) 1 male (M). Not 100% sure I just broke down how the tags work
Finally this is done.. please please please do the succubus stayed chapters next
I've seen a lot of different shit hentai and regular porn but I've never seen this so called "realistic fantasy".  the closest thing would be really shitty amateur porn.

@XanderRaidon: Often times in the real world a horny 9 or perfect 10 will date a shy, ugly-looking person. It may not be typical, but it's certainly isn't limited to "fairytale dream" fiction. Also, @jackoff9000: Some people LOVE the exact type of porn you're jesting about. There's a thing called "realistic fantasy", which is easier to imagine and thus get-off on for some people.  Can't expect everyone else to have the same tastes as you.
yeah I want to see a plain soft  chick with saggy tits and no ass have disappointing awkward sex with some random soy boy because then it'd be more realistic.  Because I want my porn realistic.
@XanderRaidon: I heard that the NTR category has some "realistic" shit. You should check that out.

Why do they always go way over the top? Grade S porn-star body, sex-crazed virgin, from distinguished family, dates random socially awkward guy. Is there some hidden tag for "realistic" h-mangas please? This is an amazing manga with perfect art style, it's just such a shame they went the "fairytale dream" plot.
"Sole Male" "Sole Female" "FFM" explain how that works.
